results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k >= 0} 1/(4*k+1)^2.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: Equals -Integral_{x=0..1} log(x)/(1 - x^4) dx. - _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 17 2020
program: (MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(100)); R:= RealField(); (8*Catalan(R) + Pi(R)^2)/16; // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 23 2018
results.author: _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 11 2013
